update LY_COUPONS_TYPES_TBL

DEF_MANUAL_SELECT = #{defManualSelect,jdbcType=DECIMAL,typeHandler=com.comerzzia.core.util.mybatis.typehandlers.BooleanNumberTypeHandler},
PREFIX = #{prefix,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAX_LENGTH = #{maxLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GENERATION_MODE = #{generationMode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where UID_ACTIVIDAD = #{uidActividad,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and COUPON_TYPE_CODE = #{couponTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
